name: Light Em Up (Meelas)
description:
Split-Screen versus sneak "shooter" where the premise is to use an unconventional weapon to attack your opponents.  Sneak around your friends and flash a light in their direction and watch as the  sentient stage flattens them like a pancake!

Concept:

Connect at least 2 devices (keyboard/mouse and controller compatible) and press a key to join the game.

Sneak around the map and try to locate your opponents. Once you see one, shoot, and the stage will attack them. If there is only one player remaining, go to the red orb in the center and claim your prize!

Controls can be viewed by hitting ESC on the keyboard in-game.
